first_translate: fiona green...

hangle: 그녀는 백작가의 사생아로 불운한 유년 시절을 보냈으나
first_translate: she was born as the illegitimate child of a noble family and had an unfortunate childhood.
but she grew up to become talented at casting spells,
and later became known as one great magician.
it’s your typical protagonist cliché story.

hangle: 그러나 피오나는 절대로 주인공이 될 수 없다.
first_translate: but there is no way that fiona can ever become the main character.
fiona,

hangle: 이 아비의 말을 듣고 있는 거냐.
first_translate: did you hear what I just said?
count green, fiona's biological father.
I'm sorry, father.
that little brat has some nerve.

hangle: 저리 천한 건 신경 쓰지 마세요, 아버지.
first_translate: do not worry about her, father.
caindel, firstborn son of house green.
I want to slap her across the face so badly right now.

hangle: 천한 취급이 아무리 열 받아도 참아야 한다.
first_translate: no matter how angry I get from being treated like dirt, I must hold back my anger.
right now, fiona is only thirteen years old...

hangle: 별다른 힘도 없는 그린 가문의 짐 덩어리 사생아일 뿐이니까.
first_translate: ...and nothing but a powerless bastard daughter of house green.
this is where I am right now.
in this girl named fiona green's body.
even though she may seem like a useless bastard daughter for now,

hangle: 훗날 천재 마법사로 칭송받게 되는 피오나!
first_translate: later on, she will come to be known as a genius magician!

hangle: 그럼에도 불구하고, 피오나가 되었다는 건 좋은 상황이 아니다.
first_translate: still, becoming fiona isn’t exactly good news.
of course, even if she does have a promising future ahead of her,
the thing is, fiona is not the main character! she's actually the final boss!

hangle: 그것도 주인공 커플의 사랑의 힘에 장렬히 죽음을 맞이하는 최종 보스!
first_translate: not only that, she dies by the power of love shared by the male and female leads!

hangle: 정말 부정하고 싶지만… 이건 이미 운명적으론 정해진 결말이다.
first_translate: as much as I don't want to believe it, this ending has already been set in stone.

hangle: 이곳은 황제인 남주인공과 성녀인 여주인공이 연애하며 세계를 구하는 내용의 소설 속 세계다.
first_translate: this world exists inside a novel where the male lead, who becomes the emperor, falls in love with the saintly female lead while saving the world together.
and here,

hangle: 이곳에 악역인 피오나를 위한 자비는 없다.
first_translate: there is absolutely no mercy shown toward villains like fiona.

hangle: 마지막쯤 피오나는 불사에 가까운 존재가 되어 주인공 커플을 위협한다.
first_translate: near the end, fiona comes close to gaining immortality and threatens the lives of the two protagonists.

hangle: 그에 남자 주인공은 검으로 피오나의 목을 베고,
first_translate: to stop her, the male lead cuts off her head with his sword,

hangle: 뽑혔음에도 박동하는 검게 물든 심장 깊숙이 검을 박는다.
first_translate: then stabs deep into her heart which continues to beat despite having been ripped out.

hangle: 그렇게 피오나의 목은 성벽에 효시 되고
first_translate: fiona's severed head gets hung over the castle walls,
while the rest of her body is burned away.

hangle: 피오나의 영혼은 어둠 속에 빠져 영원히 끝나지 않을 고통을 받는다…
first_translate: finally, her soul sinks into darkness and suffers eternal pain forevermore...

hangle: 이것이 나의 미래가 될지 모르는 ‘피오나’의 운명.
first_translate: this could very well be my fate as "fiona."

hangle: 차라리 지금 죽으면 편히 갈 수 있으려나.
first_translate: maybe dying now would make things easier.
wait, let me think about all this later.
if I keep getting distracted, I'll probably get hit again with that cane.

hangle: 요즘 전쟁의 상황이 좋지 않다는 건 다들 알고 있을 게다.
first_translate: I’m sure everyone knows that we’re losing the war these days.

hangle: 황궁에서 북방 전선에 보낼 마법사를 차출하라는 명이 떨어졌다.
first_translate: an order came down from the imperial palace asking us to send magicians to fight on the northern front lines.
from our household.
currently, we are six years before the start of the original story.

hangle: 마물들과의 싸움에 밀려 제국이 한참 불리할 시기다.
first_translate: at this point in time, the empire is struggling against monsters.

hangle: 그저 남녀 주인공이 악룡과 마물로부터 세상을 구원하기 위해 설정된 배경이지만…
first_translate: all of this is merely background information leading up to when the male and female leads save the world from evil dragons and other beasts,
but for now, this is reality.

hangle: 때문에 너희들 중 한 명은 북방의 전선에 참전해야 한다.
first_translate: for that reason, one of you three needs to go join the battlefronts in the north.
going to war? really, father?
is he talking about us?
my goodness...

hangle: 그린 가문은 제국의 마법사 가문 중 하나이고,
first_translate: house green is one of many households within the empire made up entirely of mages.
so naturally, they were ordered to provide support.
the problem is,

hangle: 여기서 대체 누가 전쟁에 나가냐는 것이다.
first_translate: exactly who among them goes to war.

hangle: 내 자식 중에 이 영광스러운 일에 자원할 사람이 있는지 궁금하구나.
first_translate: now, I wonder if any of my children wish to volunteer themselves for such glorious work.
oh!
let her do it, freeloader.

hangle: 나를 제외한 모두가 백작 부인의 소생.
first_translate: with the exception of myself, everyone else present is the offspring of the countess.

hangle: 다들 쓸모없는 사생아인 내가 전쟁에 나가기를 바랄 테다.
first_translate: they'd all prefer that the worthless bastard daughter went to war instead.

hangle: 그 사생아가 겨우 열세 살 된 어린아이 일지라도.
first_translate: even if that bastard daughter happens to be a mere thirteen-year-old kid.
dear husband, look! our youngest wants to volunteer herself.

hangle: 수줍어서 크게 말은 못하는 것 같지만,
first_translate: she seems too shy to say anything aloud,
w-wait...!
w-wait...!
you wretched child...
ooh, okay then. so you’ll go.
a perfect match made in heaven, huh?
are those two working together or something?
this is a prestigious position representing our household.

hangle: 천한 네가 이런 기회를 얻을 수 있는 것에 감사하도록.
first_translate: be grateful that someone as lowly as yourself received such an opportunity.
okay, fiona.

hangle: 카인델은 가문을 이어야 하고, 난 곧 결혼할 예정이란다.
first_translate: kaindel must inherit the title, and I plan on marrying soon.
zane also plans on proposing to his fiancée shortly.

hangle: 상황이 이러니 네가 가는 게 좋겠구나.
first_translate: given the circumstances, it’d best if you went.

hangle: 사생아는 자격이 없다고 마법도 가르쳐 준 적 없으면서!
first_translate: how dare him?! he never taught me any magic because he thought bastards weren't worthy enough!
instead, he locked me up in the attic every day and abused me.

hangle: 마법을 쓰는 기본적인 방법은 알고 있지만.
first_translate: I know the basics behind using magic,
but I--
I mean...

hangle: 그래, 이건 애초에 선택지가 없는 문제였다.
first_translate: alright, alright. this wasn’t a choice to begin with anyway.

hangle: 이 저택에 내 편 따위는 없다.
first_translate: inside this mansion, nobody takes my side.

hangle: 주연도 아니었던 피오나에게 주어진 과거 설정은 단 한 줄.
first_translate: the backstory given to fiona, who wasn’t originally part of the main cast, consisted of a single line:
“she suffered abuse growing up as a bastard child.”
al-alright.
haa
ahh
I-I'll go.

hangle: 만약 가족들을 없앤다고 해도 감옥에나 갇히겠지
first_translate: even if I killed my entire family, I'd still wind up in prison.

hangle: 가야 한다면 차라리 내 두 발로 나가자.
first_translate: if I need to leave, might as well walk out voluntarily.
good job making the right decision.
I couldn’t be prouder of you.
finally, you've decided to pay back everything we’ve done for you.

hangle: 사람 취급도 안 하고 다락방에 가둬놓다 웬일로 가족 모임에 부르나 했다.
first_translate: I wondered why they called me downstairs since they always kept me trapped in the attic without treating me like a human being.

hangle: 1년 전 이 몸에 빙의했다는 걸 알았을 때도 이렇게 슬프진 않았어.
first_translate: when I found out last year that I possessed this body, I didn't feel anywhere near as sad as I do now.

hangle: 본래 이 자리에 있었을 최종 악역 피오나도
first_translate: I wonder if the villainous fiona who was supposed to be sitting here felt...
...the same emotions as I did.

hangle: 일평생 누구에게도 사랑받지 못한 피오나는 세상을 원망했고
first_translate: fiona resented the whole world after living a life unloved by anyone.

hangle: 결국 잘못된 선택으로 돌이킬 수 없는 늪에 빠지게 된다.
first_translate: eventually, she makes poor choices and ends up stuck in a situation beyond repair.

hangle: 하지만 그녀와 달리 그 누구도 원망할 생각이 안 든다.
first_translate: unlike her however, I don't resent anybody.
after all, this place is simply a world created by me.
